Description:
Dermatologic cosmetic procedures include Sclerotherapy, injection of (Fillers, Botox, Non-surgical lifting Threads, Mesotherapy, Platelet-rich plasma and Skin boosters) and medium and deep Chemical Peels.
Diagnosis and treatment of more advanced dermatopathological entities, Skin biopsies, Cryosurgery and electrosurgery.
Chemexfoliation and superficial chemical peels.
Perform inpatient and outpatient surgeries.
